name: Create or update an Odoo product when a Shopify product changes

outputs.name: Skip product create if it already exists
Create a product template for variants

fields.description:
A storable product is a product for which you manage stock. The Inventory app has to be installed.
A consumable product is a product for which stock is not managed.
A service is a non-material product you provide.
fields.label: Product Type

fields.description: Default unit of measure used for all stock operations.
fields.label: Unit of Measure

fields.description: Default unit of measure used for purchase orders. It must be in the same category as the default unit of measure.
fields.label: Purchase Unit

fields.description: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.
fields.label: Sales Order Line

fields.description: Gives the sequence order when displaying a product list
fields.label: Sequence

fields.description: A description of the Product that you want to communicate to your customers. This description will be copied to every Sales Order, Delivery Order and Customer Invoice/Credit Note
fields.label: Sales Description

fields.description: Price at which the product is sold to customers.
fields.label: Sales Price

fields.description:
Value of the product (automatically computed in AVCO).
        Used to value the product when the purchase cost is not known (e.g. inventory adjustment).
        Used to compute margins on sale orders.
fields.label: Cost

fields.description: If unchecked, it will allow you to hide the product without removing it.
fields.label: Active

fields.description: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category.
fields.label: Income Account

fields.description: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category. If anglo-saxon accounting with automated valuation method is configured, the expense account on the product category will be used.
fields.label: Expense Account

fields.description: https://taxcode.avatax.avalara.com/
fields.label: Avatax Category

fields.description:
Manually set quantities on order: Invoice based on the manually entered quantity, without creating an analytic account.
Timesheets on contract: Invoice based on the tracked hours on the related timesheet.
Create a task and track hours: Create a task on the sales order validation and track the work hours.
fields.label: Track Service

fields.description: Validated expenses can be re-invoiced to a customer at its cost or sales price.
fields.label: Re-Invoice Expenses

fields.description:
Ordered Quantity: Invoice quantities ordered by the customer.
Delivered Quantity: Invoice quantities delivered to the customer.
fields.label: Invoicing Policy

fields.description: If enabled, a shift will automatically be generated for the selected role when confirming the Sales Order. Only employees with this role will automatically be assigned shifts for Sales Orders containing this service.
fields.label: Plan Services

outputs.name: Odoo product id from search or create
Search for existing product variant by sku
Search for existing product by sku
Has product attributes, no existing product variant

fields.description:
A storable product is a product for which you manage stock. The Inventory app has to be installed.
A consumable product is a product for which stock is not managed.
A service is a non-material product you provide.

fields.label: Sales Order Line

fields.description: This is the sum of the extra price of all attributes
fields.label: Variant Price Extra

fields.description: The sale price is managed from the product template. Click on the 'Configure Variants' button to set the extra attribute prices.
fields.label: Sales Price

fields.description: If unchecked, it will allow you to hide the product without removing it.
fields.label: Active

fields.description: International Article Number used for product identification.
fields.label: Barcode

fields.description:
Value of the product (automatically computed in AVCO).
        Used to value the product when the purchase cost is not known (e.g. inventory adjustment).
        Used to compute margins on sale orders.

fields.label: Avatax Category
